Posts.Content: Brittany- Ive been EXACTLY where your mom is right now..she probably doesnt even know how she made it thru the holidays...now ontto healing...get her the book "My Beautiful Life" by Mina Dobic- FAST...or simply peruse her website minadobic.org & specifically check out her story & testimonails...there are other books as well...jsut to name a few (some out of print now- wouldÂ have to get from Amazon) "recalled by Life" Anthony Satillaro; "My Recovery from Cancer" Elaine Nussbaum...that'll keep you busy for now.. Best of Luck!!!
Posts.Title: Mom was just diagnosed with Stage IV Breast Cancer
